page.title: 11PARSONS TIMBERYARD AND MILL
page.content: This yard was built in{1850}on the banks of the River 0use, it covers an area of just under an acre.It has a work force of 15.The largest machine is called a four cutter as it cuts all four sides at once.Most of the woods used are softwoods and is imported from{RUSSIA,FINLAND,NORWAY AND SWEDEN these include{COMEN SILVER FIR,RED {SILVER FIR OR PACIFIC SILVER FIR,SANTA {LUCIA FIR,GREEK FIR,COLORADO FIR,WHITE {FIR AND FOREST SILVER FIR}they provide all types of sawn timber for the local building trade.The firm is now owned by Mr Keer and is run by him and his two sons,who operate the office. Customers can either collect their material direct or have it delivered locally.They also have a large hopper which stores all the sawdust which is sold as bedding for animals. By Grail Allanson, James Moore.
